name: Voice Shooter "Pif Paf"
description: Voice Shooter "Pif Paf" this is a simple, but funny 'shooter' where the fire (shooting) is implemented by voice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: This game was developed on Windows XP and practically can runs on calculator. If you think I'm crazy to create a game on Windows XP, then you're absolutely right.
